German[edit]

German Wikipedia has an article on:
Schüler
Wikipedia de

Etymology[edit]

From Middle High German [Term?], from Old High German [Term?], from Latin [Term?].

Structurally, Schule +‎ -er

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈʃyːlɐ/
  • audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Schüler m (genitive Schülers, plural Schüler, female Schülerin)

  1. (school) pupil, student, schoolboy or schoolgirl
  2. disciple

Declension[edit]
